nodes.text: The Haseria system was located in the Haserian sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. It was connected by the Reena Trade Route to the Monastery system as well as the Druckenwell system in the Doldur sector. The Haseria system was home to the sentient Haserian species.
The Haseria system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square P-15.
